/** * Handler for exceptions thrown by event subscribers. * * @since 16.0 */
unit.class:
public interface SubscriberExceptionHandler { /** * Handles exceptions thrown by subscribers. */
void
handleException (
Throwable
exception
,
SubscriberExceptionContext
context
)
;
}
